Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal microorganism multiplex nucleic acid-based assay
Analyte(s): O-antigen gene cluster (fcl) of E. coli O157
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Micronics PanNAT STEC Test, a cartridge-based real-time PCR assay for stx1, stx2, and O157 E. coli detection using the PanNAT System from stool specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, in vitro nucleic acid amplification-based test for simultaneous detection and identification of stx1, stx2 Shiga toxin genes, and O-antigen gene cluster of E. coli O157 in unpreserved or Cary-Blair preserved stool from patients with gastrointestinal infection signs or symptoms, to aid in detecting Shiga-toxin expressing E. coli strains.
